product.name: Round Bidet Toilet Seat with Quiet-Close, Non-Electric Bidet Toilet Seat with Self Cleaning Dual Nozzles, Fit Round Toilet Seat, White Bidet Seat with Brass inlet (Round)
product.bullet_points:
• Bidet Toilet Seat: This white Round toilet seat with bidet functionality measures (16.5"L x 14"W x 2”H) fits round toilets.It can save you a lot of toilet paper, and the bidet function allows you to use it with peace of mind, comfort and ease of use!
• Bidet Function: Non-electric dual nozzles bidet parts, ergonomic water jet design, rear and frontal wash modes for you experience more comfortable cleaning. The ideal water pressure and cleaning mode can also be adjusted during use.
• Slow-Close Toilet Seat Lid：Slow-closing hinges prevents slamming. The seat closes slowly and quietly with a gentle pressure.This greatly reduces damage to the toilet lid when it is closed, prolonging the life of the lid and creating a peaceful bathroom environment. The bottom of the product also comes with its own non-slip bumpers, which helps minimize toilet seat shifting and sliding during use.
• Easy to Installation：The product includes 1*Toilet seat bidet,1*T-adapter with pressure control and shut-off function，1*Stainless steel hose,and other accessories required for installation. Can be installed all by yourself in just 15 minutes.If you encounter any problems during installation, you can check the product's installation manual or installation video, there will be detailed steps to help you complete the installation.
• Clirass: Clirass round bidet toilet seat provide refreshing cleaning experience for you. Whether you have any questions about the product will have a professional team dedicated to serve you! You can rest assured that you can take the product home and use it or give it as a gift to your friends and family.
